description: Development and support of online cosmetics e-shop.
Implemented new components in adaptive layout in legacy codebase.
Development of UI part of service for increasing popularity in instagram.
Added multilanguage support which does not require page reloading.
Decreased high coupling of legacy code with modular approach.
Created from scratch admin UI for internal company projects.
Took part in UI development of online interior design software.
Interface elements implemented in pure Javascript, HTML and CSS without frameworks.
Decreased coupling of components with pattern Publisher/Subscriber.
